familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Capital Gains income from C-III Recovery Fund I LP (Financial Investments; Irving, TX) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: C-III Recovery Fund I LP (Financial Investments; Irving, TX)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Capital Gains Rent or Royalties income from C-III Recovery Fund I LP (Financial Investments; Irving, TX) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. Underlying assets are not disclosed due to preexisting confidentiality agreement. This asset has been divested.
familyMemberEthics.business: C-III Recovery Fund I LP (Financial Investments; Irving, TX)

familyMemberEthics.description: Another asset of Jared Kushner's, KF- C-111 Recovery Fund II, is reportedly invested in C-III Recovery Fund II. However, C-III Recovery Fund II is not included in his 2017 financial disclosure. Because the investment vehicle reportedly has been divested, this record is categorized as a resolved potential conflict of interest.
familyMemberEthics.business: C-III Recovery Fund II, LP; Irving, Tx
